sqlQuery.name: PathwayAlias
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, pathway_source, source_id as old_source_id, pathway_source as old_pathway_source from webready.PathwayAttributes

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: select pa.source_id, pa.pathway_source, pa.name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project from webready.PathwayAttributes pa

sqlQuery.name: CompoundsFromMetabolicPathways
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pa.source_id, pa.pathway_source, pr.enzyme as ec_number, pr.enzyme_description, pr.substrates_text, pr.products_text, pc.compound_source_id, pc.chebi_accession, cid.id as compound_other_id from webready.PathwayAttributes pa, webready.PathwayCompounds pc, webready.PathwayReactions pr left join (select compound, id from webready.CompoundId where compound != id ) cid on pc.compound_source_id = cid.compound where pc.pathway_id = pa.pathway_id and pr.reaction_id = pc.reaction_id and pr.ext_db_name = pc.ext_db_name
